title: Dear Paul Graham, there is no cookie banner law
dot: digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, color="#6CA6CD"];edge[color="#36454F"];MainIdea[label="Dear Paul Graham, there is no cookie banner law", shape=oval, style=filled, color="#FF6347"];Subpoint1[label="EU does not mandate cookie banners", shape=box, style=filled, color="#ADD8E6"];Subpoint2[label="Companies force cookie banners for tracking", shape=box, style=filled, color="#ADD8E6"];Subpoint3[label="Alternatives to cookie banners", shape=box, style=filled, color="#ADD8E6"];Subpoint4[label="Companies' self-interest vs user privacy", shape=box, style=filled, color="#ADD8E6"];Detail1[label="Listen to 'Do Not Track' headers", shape=box, style=filled, color="#B0E0E6"];Detail2[label="Tracking icon on browsers", shape=box, style=filled, color="#B0E0E6"];Detail3[label="Small consent line at the top", shape=box, style=filled, color="#B0E0E6"];Detail4[label="Small tracking button at the bottom", shape=box, style=filled, color="#B0E0E6"];MainIdea->Subpoint1;MainIdea->Subpoint2;MainIdea->Subpoint3;MainIdea->Subpoint4;Subpoint3->Detail1;Subpoint3->Detail2;Subpoint3->Detail3;Subpoint3->Detail4;}

title: Elegant open source project tracking, Trello like but self-hosted
